climbs.name: Istoriya Arkanarskoy Rezni
climbs.fa: FA - Phil and Cabe Reynolds, April 2015

content.description: Clean, beautiful hand crack splits a small roof with great exposure and moves.
content.protection: Standard trad rack with gear to 3 inches.
content.location: From low spot on slab climb up and slightly left to line directly under obvious crack.  Perfect hand jams go under and through roof where steepness eases to top.  Belay anywhere and walk off to the west side of formation.

climbs.name: The God That Failed
climbs.fa: FA - Phil and Cabe Reynolds, April 2015

content.description: Awesome hand crack with great protection, is disappointingly short.
content.location: West most line on Sabbath Slab starts at low point of main slab.  Scramble up first 40 feet to "saddle" between The Represstional and slab then climb the right leaning killer splitter crack to top. Belay anywhere and walk off the top north, down climb and then west down blocks and scree.

climbs.name: Gallows Pole
climbs.fa: FA - Phil and Cabe Reynolds, April 2015

content.description: From main starting spot on slab climb up through blocks and take line at shallow right hand corner to top.  Use face features and finger cracks on fun straight forward route.
content.location: Middle of slab looking up.  Avoid roof to the east.

climbs.name: As I Lay Dying
climbs.fa: FA - Phil and Tally Reynolds, Sept 2016

content.description: Two pitch easy lead climbs face features through intimidating looking roof on solid rock with a few finger cracks.  Belay at juniper tree and climb shorter second pitch on easier ground to top.
content.location: Start at low center point on slab.  Exit summit via down climb to north and scree scramble west to base.

climbs.name: Alter Boys and Blow
climbs.fa: FA - Phil and Tally Reynolds, Sept 2016

content.description: Climb easy trad route on less perfect rock in two pitches to top.  No real crux with some scrambling.
content.location: Start to the east of slab low spot and climb straight up over less challenging rock.
